mapper.select: SELECT NOTE_NO, NOTE_TITLE, NOTE_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, READ_CHECK, SEND_STATUS, RECEIVE_STATUS, SEND_NO, RECEIVE_NO, SM.MEMBER_NAME SEND_NAME FROM TB_NOTE N JOIN TB_MEMBER SM ON (N.SEND_NO = SM.MEMBER_NO) WHERE RECEIVE_NO = #{no} AND SEND_STATUS = 'N'
